sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE ESAAUML ( SYS_ID VARCHAR(18) NOT NULL, LANG_CD VARCHAR(18) NOT NULL, MENU_CD VARCHAR(18) NOT NULL, MENU_NM VARCHAR(60), REM VARCHAR(128), STS CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'C', REG_ID VARCHAR(18), REG_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), MOD_ID VARCHAR(18), MOD_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), CONSTRAINT ESAAUML_PK PRIMARY KEY (SYS_ID,LANG_CD,MENU_CD) )

WITH T1 ( SYS_ID ,LANG_CD ,MENU_CD ,MENU_NM ,REM ,STS ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT ) AS ( SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CMT00000', '결재', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CMT10010', '결재목록', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CMT10020', '결재결과 관리', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CMT10030', '결재선 관리', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'CMT10070', '부재 설정', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'PCA00070', '설계원가 차수COPY', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'PCA00080', '원가계산 복원', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'ko_KR', 'PCC00000', '기본원가정보', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'ko_KR', 'PCC00110', '공법 차수 정보', NULL, 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', NULL, 'SYSTEMPG', NULL FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESAAUML B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.LANG_CD = A.LANG_CD AND B.MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD
